channel.title: I need help with the whole "Server" thing. Please help!
channel.description:
When I pull up the JDK Java thing (which I think is Client.Java but I'm not sure) and it says to type in "ctrl + H" and other codes like that... But I'm not sure what it's suppose to do. I can't open the server I downloaded. When I click on compile.bat, a screen pops up and says, " 'javac ' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operate or batch file." and when I click on runserver.bat, it says,"Expection in thread 'main' Java.Lang.NoClassDefFound error: server" I downloaded "Project 16 v6" and honestly, I have no idea what to do. Lol. So please help me with this...
[b]Thanks![/b]

item.title: I need help with the whole "Server" thing. Please help!
item.dc:creator: @_RoxMySox ~RoxMySox~
item.description:
@_RoxMySox wrote:

When I pull up the JDK Java thing (which I think is Client.Java but I’m not sure) and it says to type in “ctrl + H” and other codes like that… But I’m not sure what it’s suppose to do. I can’t open the server I downloaded. When I click on compile.bat, a screen pops up and says, " 'javac ’ is not recognized as an internal or external command, operate or batch file." and when I click on runserver.bat, it says,“Expection in thread ‘main’ Java.Lang.NoClassDefFound error: server” I downloaded “Project 16 v6” and honestly, I have no idea what to do. Lol.
So please help me with this…

Thanks!
